DOC.brief_summary: Efficacy safety BI 1356 compare placebo patient type 2 diabetes insufficient glycaemic control despite treatment sulfonylurea drug .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized , Double-blind ( db ) , Placebo-controlled 18 Week Study Linagliptin ( BI 1356 ) Type 2 Diabetic Patients With Insufficient Glycaemic Control Sulfonylurea Drug
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients 18 80 year old type 2 diabetes insufficient glycemic control [ glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c 7 % 10 % ) ] despite therapy sulfonylurea drug Exclusion criterion : Myocardial infarction , stroke transient ischaemic attack last 6 month Treatment rosiglitazone , pioglitazone , GLP1 analogues , insulin antiobesity drug past 3 month Impaired hepatic function Severe renal impairment Current treatment systemic steroid Change thyroid hormone dosage Hereditary galactose intolerance
